biotools.summary: DeepCSO is an online prediction tool for the recognition of Cysteine S-sulphenylation (CSO) sites. DeepCSO contains three LSTM models: two species-specific models and one general model.

bioschemas.name: DeepCSO
bioschemas.summary: DeepCSO is an online prediction tool for the recognition of Cysteine S-sulphenylation (CSO) sites. DeepCSO contains three LSTM models: two species-specific models and one general model.
